snippet.title: Burst! 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
In our latest trailer, we're pleased to announce BOP's voice actor, Matt Bronson!! We also reveal the story of Burst!, where you're tasked with helping BOP put on the best firework shows to wow people and convince the firework company to send more merch (songs, explosion types, explosion colors and invitations to perform in more 3D venues)!!!

Be sure to wishlist Burst! on Steam at https://store.steampowered.com/app/2111480/Burst/ and prepare to help BOP light up the night!

To learn more about Add-A-Tudez and what we do as a studio, check us out:
www.teamkaizengames.com
www.teamkaizengames.com/ingenium
www.twitch.tv/addatudez
www.twitter.com/zookeytk
